Schedule Now
Terms and Conditions
How do I get started?
Once you complete our online sign-up form, your local area Laundry Care Provider will contact you via phone to schedule your first laundry pick-up. Click here to get started now!
When will I get my clothes back?
Turnaround time is 48 Hours from pick-up to drop off (except weekends).
What if I need my laundry done faster?
24 Hour Rush Service is available in most locations for an extra charge. Ask your local Laundry Care Provider for details or call 800-429-4332 to confirm rush service is available for your order.
What if I can’t be home for my scheduled pick-up or drop off?
You can leave your bag in secure location outside your home (doorstep, porch, patio, reception desk etc.) or reschedule a day/time with your Provider.

Along with your laundry bag, your Provider can take your dry clean only items to our preferred dry cleaner and pick them back up. They’ll be delivered right to your door with your wash and fold laundry.

All scheduling is handled by your local Laundry Care Provider. Refer to your sign-up confirmation email email for your Provider’s contact information. You can also contact Laundry Care Home Office via email at info@laundrycare.biz or by calling 800-429-4332, OPT 1
Absolutely not! Each bag is processed by itself. We will never clean your clothes with another customer’s clothing.

If you miss your pick-up or drop off timeframe, a missed pick-up or missed drop off fee may be assessed. Avoid these additional fees by notifying and rescheduling your pick-up/ drop off directly with your local Laundry Care Provider.

We ask that you ensure all items have been removed from your pockets prior to pick-up. In the event that we do find items in your pockets, we’ll return them inside a sealed bag along with your laundry.

Recurring clients are provided with a reusable nylon Laundry Care bag at a charge of $3.92/bag. This charge will appear on your initial service invoice or at any time you request a new/replacement bag

we try to connect the people with Laundry Care Provider through this app.\n\n The main motive of our app is to provide Laundry Services at your door step at reasonable cost with user friendly enviornment through our app.

About Team :

 We developed this application with team ,who are always passinate to learn new things and believes in action rather than voice.

 We believed that CREATIVITY can solve almost any problem. In this belief, we try to connect the customer with blood and Laundry Care Provider through this app.

 The main motive of our app is to provide Laundry Services at your door step at reasonable cost with user friendly enviornment through our app. 

 About Company :

 Mansopresk is the fastest growing software developement company.The motto has always been timely service, best quality and optimum cost.

 Always keep in touch with the customers through quality, performance, service and assistance. We value the trust and beliefs vested in us by our clients and professional contacts and provide a dedicated service with an honest and direct approach in all our dealings.

 Our Company always encourage the new thoughts and creativity in developing applications to get the better solutions which meet new requirements, unarticulated needs, or existing market needs.

HOW IT WORKS?

 PLACE ORDER

 Go to our laundry app or website and schedule your wash as per your convenience. We will take it from there. Hassel free, fast and simple!


PICK UP

 Just be ready with your Laundry, we will be right there with our eco-friendly laundry cart. We will grab away all the dirty clothes from your home.


WASH and IRON

 We take dirt very seriously. Our experts, with the help of our state of art machinery ensure that your clothes come back looking clean, tidier and fresh every time.


DELIVERY

 Your clothes will be delivered at your doorstep on time and as fresh as daisy. Now getting your laundry done is that convenient. Didn't we tell you laundry is so easy with LaundroKart?


Why choose us?

* Your items will ONLY be given with a designated person or dropped off in a predetermined place with your prior approval. Please refer to our Terms of Service for more information.
* A courier fee will apply. Ask your Laundry Care Provider for details.
* if you’ve pre-paid for service, you will not be refunded for missed pick-ups.

* Laundry Care bag at a charge of $3.92/bag. This fee only applies to accounts with as-needed or recurring frequency and does NOT apply to one-time service clients. If you are needing service only one or two times you will place your items in 13 gallon sized trash bags.
